General.Name: Zhejiang Runtu Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Runtu Co., Ltd. produces and sells dyes in China. It offers disperse, reactive, direct, blend, cationic, and vat dyes; and chemical intermediate products, textile auxiliaries, sodium hydrosulfite, sulfuric acid, chlorinate alkali, and hydrogen peroxide. Zhejiang Runtu Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
General.Address: Runtu Building, Bldg 1, Fortune Plaza, Shaoxing, China, 312300
